EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic and DXC Executive Partnership Update 06.08.2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Below please find our weekly Executive Partnership Update. The goal is to provide insight into the install base, active pursuits, and weekly activity. This weekly summary is sent every Friday to update stakeholders on progress across the partnership.
Any questions or comments, please reach out.
Thanks,
Greg
